snippet: The Security Council approved a resolution that promised support for an African Union force in the Central African Republic and raised the possibility of a United Nations peacekeeping mission.
abstract: United Nations Security Council unanimously approves resolution aimed at stabilizing Central African Republic, dangerous and dysfunctional country that has descended into near-total chaos over six months.
lead_paragraph: The Security Council approved a resolution that promised support for an African Union force in the Central African Republic and raised the possibility of a United Nations peacekeeping mission.

headline.main: U.N. Backs Peace Effort for Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: U.N. Backs Peace Effort for African Nation
